name: mooran1
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wi(wo(wmo(s0, w0), wmo(s0, w1)), wmo(s0, wa(w0, w1)))

stmt.origin: jaoi(wmo(s0, w0), wmo(s0, w1), wmo(s0, wa(w0, w1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wo(wmo(s0, w0), wmo(s0, w1)), wmo(s0, wa(w0, w1)))
-| wi(wmo(s0, w0), wmo(s0, wa(w0, w1)))
-| wi(wmo(s0, w1), wmo(s0, wa(w0, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wo(wmo(s0, w0), wmo(s0, w1)), wmo(s0, wa(w0, w1)))
-| wi(wmo(s0, w0), wmo(s0, wa(w0, w1)))
-| wi(wmo(s0, w1), wmo(s0, wa(w0, w1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wmo(s0, w0), wmo(s0, wa(w0, w1)))
-| wi(wa(w0, w1), w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wo(wmo(s0, w0), wmo(s0, w1)), wmo(s0, wa(w0, w1)))
-| wi(wmo(s0, w1), wmo(s0, wa(w0, w1)))
-| wi(wa(w0, w1), w0)

|- wi(wo(wmo(s0, w0), wmo(s0, w1)), wmo(s0, wa(w0, w1)))
-| wi(wmo(s0, w1), wmo(s0, wa(w0, w1)))
|- wi(wo(wmo(s0, w0), wmo(s0, w1)), wmo(s0, wa(w0, w1)))

comment: "At most one" imports disjunction to conjunction. (Contributed by NM, 5-Apr-2004.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 9-Jul-2011.)
